components.name: ButtonComponent

inputsClass.name: icon
inputsClass.rawdescription:
The optional icon used in the button.
If blank the button will not have an icon
inputsClass.description: The optional icon used in the button. If blank the button will not have an icon

inputsClass.name: variant
inputsClass.rawdescription: The variant used for the button.

components.name: InputComponent

inputsClass.name: disabled
inputsClass.rawdescription: Determines if the input field is disabled. Affects the styles of the whole component.
inputsClass.description: Determines if the input field is disabled. Affects the styles of the whole component.

inputsClass.name: error
inputsClass.rawdescription: Determines if the input field has errors. Affects the styles of the whole component.
inputsClass.description: Determines if the input field has errors. Affects the styles of the whole component.

inputsClass.name: leadingIcon
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Icon displayed on the left side of the input field.
If not provided the icon is hidden.
inputsClass.description: Icon displayed on the left side of the input field. If not provided the icon is hidden.

inputsClass.name: placeholder
inputsClass.rawdescription: The placeholder displayed on the input field
inputsClass.description: The placeholder displayed on the input field

inputsClass.name: suffix
inputsClass.rawdescription: Text to be shown on the right side of the input field.
inputsClass.description: Text to be shown on the right side of the input field.

inputsClass.name: supportMessage
inputsClass.rawdescription: The help/error message to be displayed below the input field.
inputsClass.description: The help/error message to be displayed below the input field.

inputsClass.name: trailingIcon
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Icon displayed on the right side of the input field.
If not provided the icon is hidden.
inputsClass.description: Icon displayed on the right side of the input field. If not provided the icon is hidden.

inputsClass.name: value
inputsClass.rawdescription: the value of the input field

components.templateData:
{{ leadingIcon }} {{ suffix }} {{ trailingIcon }}
{{ supportMessage }}

components.name: StatusChipComponent
components.description: Status chip to display status inline. Takes optional label or displays the status styled accordingly.
components.rawdescription:
Status chip to display status inline.
Takes optional label or displays the status styled accordingly.
